verses.verse: And the men <S%H376><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Why hast thou <S%H4100><s%> served <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> us thus <S%H1697><s%>, that thou calledst <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8800><s%> us not, when thou wentest <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> with the Midianites <S%H4080><s%>? And they did chide <S%H7378><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him sharply <S%H2394><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, What have I done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> now in comparison of you? Is not the gleaning <S%H5955><s%> of the grapes of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than the vintage <S%H1210><s%> of Abiezer <S%H44><s%> ?

'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into your hands <S%H3027><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Oreb <S%H6159><s%> and Zeeb <S%H2062><s%>: and what was I able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in comparison of you? Then their anger <S%H7307><s%> was abated <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8804><s%> toward him, when he had said <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yarden <S%H3383><s%>, and passed over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, he, and the three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that were with him, faint <S%H5889><s%>, yet pursuing <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the men <S%H582><s%> of Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>, Give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray you, loaves <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%> that follow <S%H7272><s%> me; for they be faint <S%H5889><s%>, and I am pursuing <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>.

And the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Sukkot <S%H5523><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Are the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> now in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, that we should give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> unto thine army <S%H6635><s%> ?

And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Therefore when the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> into mine hand <S%H3027><s%>, then I will tear <S%H1758><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the tshofars <S%H6975><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and with briers <S%H1303><s%>.

And he went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thence to Penuel <S%H6439><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto them likewise <S%H2063><s%>: and the men <S%H582><s%> of Penuel <S%H6439><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him as the men <S%H582><s%> of Sukkot <S%H5523><s%> had answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.

And he spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also unto the men <S%H582><s%> of Penuel <S%H6439><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, When I come again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>, I will break down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this tower <S%H4026><s%>.

Now Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> were in Karkor <S%H7174><s%>, and their hosts <S%H4264><s%> with them, about fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men, all that were left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of all the hosts <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>: for there fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8802><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of them that dwelt <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in tents <S%H168><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Nobah <S%H5025><s%> and Jogbehah <S%H3011><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the host <S%H4264><s%>: for the host <S%H4264><s%> was secure <S%H983><s%>.

And when Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, he pursued <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, and took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%>, and discomfited <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all the host <S%H4264><s%>.
And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yo'ash <S%H3101><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from battle <S%H4421><s%> before <S%H4608><s%> the sun <S%H2775><s%> was up,

And caught <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a young man <S%H5288><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>, and enquired <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of him: and he described <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>, and the elders <S%H2205><s%> thereof, even threescore and seventeen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H7651><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

And he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the men <S%H582><s%> of Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%>, with whom ye did upbraid <S%H2778><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Are the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> now in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, that we should give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> unto thy men <S%H582><s%> that are weary <S%H3287><s%> ?

And he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and tshofars <S%H6975><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and briers <S%H1303><s%>, and with them he taught <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Sukkot <S%H5523><s%>.
And he beat down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the tower <S%H4026><s%> of Penuel <S%H6439><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he unto Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%>, What <S%H375><s%> manner of men <S%H582><s%> were they whom ye slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at Tavor <S%H8396><s%>? And they answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, As thou <S%H3644><s%> art, so were they; each one <S%H259><s%> resembled <S%H8389><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, They were my brethren <S%H251><s%>, even the sons <S%H1121><s%> of my mother <S%H517><s%>: as the YY <S%H3068><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, if <S%H3863><s%> ye had saved them alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, I would not slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Jether <S%H3500><s%> his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them. But the youth <S%H5288><s%> drew <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not his sword <S%H2719><s%>: for he feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, because he was yet a youth <S%H5288><s%>.

Then Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Rise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou, and fall <S%H6293><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon us: for as the man <S%H376><s%> is, so is his strength <S%H1369><s%>. And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Zebah <S%H2078><s%> and Zalmunna <S%H6759><s%>, and took away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ornaments <S%H7720><s%> that were on their camels <S%H1581><s%> ' necks <S%H6677><s%>.

Then the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Gid`on <S%H1439><s%>, Rule <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thou over us, both thou, and thy son <S%H1121><s%>, and thy son's <S%H1121><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> also: for thou hast delivered <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8689><s%> us from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>.

And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, I will not rule <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over you, neither shall my son <S%H1121><s%> rule <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over you: the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall rule <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over you.

And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, I would desire <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a request <S%H7596><s%> of you, that ye would give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me every man <S%H376><s%> the earrings <S%H5141><s%> of his prey <S%H7998><s%>. (For they had golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings <S%H5141><s%>, because they were Yishma`elims <S%H3459><s%>.)

And they answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We will willingly <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them. And they spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a garment <S%H8071><s%>, and did cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> therein every man <S%H376><s%> the earrings <S%H5141><s%> of his prey <S%H7998><s%>.

And the weight <S%H4948><s%> of the golden <S%H2091><s%> earrings <S%H5141><s%> that he requested <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8804><s%> was a thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> shekels of gold <S%H2091><s%>; beside ornaments <S%H7720><s%>, and collars <S%H5188><s%>, and purple <S%H713><s%> raiment <S%H899><s%> that was on the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>, and beside the chains <S%H6060><s%> that were about their camels <S%H1581><s%> ' necks <S%H6677><s%>.

And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> an ephod <S%H646><s%> thereof, and put <S%H3322><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it in his city <S%H5892><s%>, even in Ophrah <S%H6084><s%>: and all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went thither a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> it: which thing became a snare <S%H4170><s%> unto Gid`on <S%H1439><s%>, and to his house <S%H1004><s%>.

Thus was Midian <S%H4080><s%> subdued <S%H3665><s%> <S%H8735><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, so that they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%> their heads <S%H7218><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%>. And the country <S%H776><s%> was in quietness <S%H8252><s%> <S%H8799><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Gid`on <S%H1439><s%>.
And Yeruba`al <S%H3378><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yo'ash <S%H3101><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his own house <S%H1004><s%>.
And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> had threescore and ten <S%H7657><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of his body <S%H3409><s%> begotten <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: for he had many <S%H7227><s%> wives <S%H802><s%>.

And his concubine <S%H6370><s%> that was in SH'khem <S%H7927><s%>, she also bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him a son <S%H1121><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> he called <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%>.

And Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yo'ash <S%H3101><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> old age <S%H7872><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the sepulchre <S%H6913><s%> of Yo'ash <S%H3101><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, in Ophrah <S%H6084><s%> of the Abiezrites <S%H33><s%>.

And it came to pass, as soon as Gid`on <S%H1439><s%> was dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> turned again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%>, and made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Baalberith <S%H1170><s%> their god <S%H430><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the YY <S%H3068><s%> their 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, who had delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8688><s%> them out of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of all their enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on every side <S%H5439><s%>:

Neither shewed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> they kindness <S%H2617><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yeruba`al <S%H3378><s%>, namely, Gid`on <S%H1439><s%>, according to all the goodness <S%H2896><s%> which he had shewed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
